anotherskill-skillssection: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
cognition-aboutmesection: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
discoverspanone-projectssection: Explore a selection of my work here
discoverspantwo-projectssection: Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

hook-aboutmesection: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.
iminterested-contactsection: I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
introduction-aboutmesection: Hi, I’m a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Breisach am Rhein. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
introduction-skillssection: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
join-project-description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks with drag & drop features, assign users and categories.
location-aboutmesection: Since I am flexible regarding my work environment, I can work effectively both on-site in Breisach and the surrounding area and remotely.
placeholdermessage-contactsection: Hello Sebastian, I am interested in...
sharkie-project-description: Swimming and throwing game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie find coins and poison bottles to fight the giant orca.
responsiblecontent: Responsible for Content pursuant to § 55 para. 2 RStV
contentliabilitydescription: As a service provider, I am responsible for my own content on these pages under general laws in accordance with § 7 para.1 TMG. However, according to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, I am not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances indicating illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general laws remain unaffected. Liability in this regard is, however, only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific infringement. Upon becoming aware of such infringements, I will remove this content immediately.
linkliabilitydescription: My offer contains links to external third-party websites, the content of which I have no influence over. Therefore, I cannot assume any liability for this third-party content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, I will remove such links immediately.
copyrightdescription: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution, and any kind of utilization outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.
introductiontext: I take the protection of your personal data very seriously. Your privacy is important to me, and I handle your personal data confidentially and in accordance with statutory data protection regulations and this privacy policy. This privacy policy informs you about the data collected on my website, how it is used, and your rights concerning your data.
responsibleentitydetails:
The entity responsible for data processing on this website is:

Sebastian Regending
Saint-Louis-Str. 13
79206 Breisach am Rhein
sebastian@sebastian-regending.de
accessdatadetails:
When visiting my website, the following data is automatically collected and stored in server log files:

IP address
Date and time of request
Browser type and version
Operating system
Referrer URL (previously visited page)
Hostname of the accessing computer

This data is analyzed solely for the purpose of ensuring the trouble-free operation of the website and improving my offerings. It is not merged with other data sources.
contactformdetails: If you contact me via a contact form or email, the data you provide (e.g., name, email address, message) will be used solely to process your request. The data will not be shared without your explicit consent.
cookiesdetails: My website uses cookies to improve user experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device. You can disable cookie storage in your browser settings. However, please note that this may limit the functionality of the website.
legalgroundsdetails: The processing of your data is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR (fulfillment of a contract or pre-contractual measures) and Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest, such as website optimization).
yourrightsdetails:
You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

Access (Art. 15 GDPR)
Rectification (Art. 16 GDPR)
Deletion (Art. 17 GDPR)
Restriction of Processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
Data Portability (Art. 20 GDPR)
Objection to Processing (Art. 21 GDPR)

You can exercise your rights at any time by contacting me.
storagedurationdetails: I store your personal data only as long as necessary for the respective purpose or as required by legal regulations.
privacypolicychangesdetails: I reserve the right to amend this privacy policy as necessary to reflect changes in legal requirements or modifications to my offerings. The current version of the privacy policy can always be found on my website.
contactdetails: If you have questions about the processing of your personal data or exercising your rights, you can contact me at the contact details provided above.
googlefontsdetails:
My website uses fonts from Google Fonts. These fonts are stored locally on my web server and loaded directly from there. This means no connection to Google's servers is established.

No personal data (such as your IP address) is transmitted to Google or third parties when visiting my website. The use of Google Fonts is in the interest of a consistent and appealing presentation of my website. This constitutes a legitimate interest under Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR.
